name: WP Eventbrite Embedded Checkout
author: Hendra Setiawan

sections.description:
Allows people to buy Eventbrite tickets without leaving your website. Sell tickets right from your WordPress site!

DEMO

Popup Mode | Embed Mode

As an event organizer, you know that connecting your attendees to your brand and providing a seamless registration experience is key to a successful event. WP Eventbrite Checkout is an Eventbrite Plugin for WordPress that streamlines event registration and enhances your brand experience.

MAIN FEATURES

  1. Embedded the Eventbrite checkout form on the page with your content.
  2. Add a button that opens the Eventbrite checkout modal over your content.
  3. Easy to use. You just need to copy-paste the shortcode to any post or page on your website.

PRO VERSION FEATURES

  1. Ability to add unlimited events.
  2. Shortcode generator.
  3. Priority support.
  4. Unlimited site license.
  5. Lifetime updates.
  6. Lifetime support.
  7. One-time payment. No renewal required.

Visit our website for more info : https://wpeventbritecheckout.com

REQUIREMENTS

  1. SSL Certificate
  2. Eventbrite event ID
sections.installation:
1. Activate the plugin
  2. Go to Eventbrite Form
  3. Insert your Eventbrite Event ID
  4. Choose how the checkout form appears
  5. Save Setting
  6. Copy the shortcode and paste it on any post or page on your website
sections.faq:
Is it official plugin from Eventbrite?

No, this plugin is not official.

Is an SSL certificate required?

Yes, in order to embed the Eventbrite checkout form on your WordPress website, you need to have SSL certificate (https). Otherwise, it won’t works.

How to find the event ID?

Please see this official instruction from Eventbrite. How to Find the Event ID

sections.reviews:
This plugin makes my life easier

By vasile46 on November 16, 2019

I tried to add Eventbrite checkout form to my site by following their official documentation but it produced some errors on my website. I might do it wrong, but I'm not a coder so I have no idea. This plugin make the process much easier for me. Thank you so much!

Simple Plugin

By ssegepecemta on August 20, 2019

This is a great plugin that is very easy to install and use. I wish all plugin were this simple. I would give it 5 stars if we could create more than just one code at a time. If you have multiple events, we need multiple codes specific to each event.

Great plugin. Very Simple and Easy to Use 😊

By ziozio on April 13, 2019

Thank you for creating this plugin. It's very simple and working smoothly on my site. Perfect!
